name: i810 TV-OUT Lenny
short_description: Debian Lenny with the (in)famous unsupported intel i810 1.7.2 driver, which supportsTV-OUT. If you own i855GM and similar hardware this chrootable environment allows you to enable your DVO. Comes with fluxbox, gmplayer and the complete driver sources.
